title: Shroud Encounter coming to the Richmond, Virginia area in March
post: Thanks for posting Dan.  My daughter is a film major at UGA…I am finally getting a return on my investment.  The purpose of the video is to make use of social media.  Of course all the standard fare is also produced such as a press release and posters but the world communicates now through Facebook and video.  Hopefully those interested will re-post to their own FB pages to invite their friends.
author: Shroud Encounter
